title: Undocumented miss granularity of the uops cache on Skylake microarchitecture.
snippet: IntroductionStarting Sandy Brindge microarchitecture the uops cache (a.k.a. Decoded ICache, DSB, Decode Stream Buffer) is a part of the CPU Front End and is responsible for caching microoperations of recently decoded instructions. Its primary goal is to reduce power and latency of the Front End a...
